Player news

Source: R/player-news.R
player_news.Rd

The free and premium ESPN stories on given players. A maximum of 50 stories can be returned at a time.

player_news(id, parse = FALSE)

Arguments

id

A vector of player ID numbers.
parse

Should HTML stories be parsed with xml2::read_html()?

Value

A tibble of news stories.

Examples

player_news(15847)

#> # A tibble: 15 x 6
